projects.name: CMS(Content Management System)
projects.description: This is a project consisting of blog/forum discussion/sharing platform with both textual and video/visual representation of content. Key features include: 1. Blog/Discussion Forum for both Text and Video Content 2. Content Analytics 3. Hierarchical Authorization System for Content Moderation

projects.name: DC(Data Collection & Analytics)
projects.description: This is a B2B project that solves business solutions by collecting business data through survey questionnaire and deriving complex analytics from those data in order to make better business decisions

projects.name: Anonymous Feedback Application
projects.description: This a test/demo application which takes in feedback from anonymous users and displays those anonymous feedback to registered users.

projects.name: Simple Banking Application(Bangubank)
projects.description: A very simple banking application that deposits, withdraws and transfers money from one account to another.
